Docs.summary: Return a value sanitizer that allows any special characters except angle brackets ('<' and '>') and Nul ('\0').

Docs.summary: Return a value sanitizer that allows everything except Nul ('\0') characters.

Docs.summary: Return a value sanitizer that allows everything except Nul ('\0') characters, space (' '), and other whitespace characters.

Docs.summary: Return a value sanitizer that does not allow any special characters, and also does not allow script URLs.
